He also explains why he appears on advertisements, and why he walked the ramp during a recent fashion event in Chennai that celebrated classical musicians. Dushyant also talks about the trips he puts together for yatris; in 2026, he has Kerala, Cambodia and Egypt on the list.

title: Slashed 26 times: Kanpur woman axes husband to death after drunken fight

Peerzada Ashiq reports on how the incident continues to impact tourism

description: Vaibhav Sooryavanshi, a young cricketer, made headlines in the past year. He received the Pradhan Mantri Rashtriya Bal Puraskar, India's highest civilian honor for young achievers. Sooryavanshi broke several cricket records, including the youngest player to score a century in List A cricket. He also achieved a T20 century at a young age.

title: Himachal Pradesh: Doctors launch indefinite strike after colleague sacked over assault
description: Resident doctors in Himachal Pradesh have launched an indefinite strike, demanding the reinstatement of a doctor sacked for assaulting a patient. Despite a promise of a fresh inquiry, doctors deem the termination unjust, citing a lack of consideration for the doctor's perspective. The protest has disrupted routine medical services across the state.

title: Brittany Mahomes looks past Chiefs struggles, praises Patrick’s off-field impact
description: Patrick Mahomes' 15 and the Mahomies Foundation is making a significant community impact, with partner Youth Volunteer Corps reporting over 92,000 volunteer hours and $3.2 million in community benefit. Brittany Mahomes actively supports these efforts, highlighting the foundation's growing influence beyond football.  The foundation's initiatives, like Read for 15 and Volunteer for 15, foster positive development in young people.

description: As the world’s third-best chess player at the moment — also the third-highest-rated player in history — Caruana has lofty standards. It’s perhaps why the 33-year-old says he isn’t happy with his 2025, despite winning big events. In this chat, he also speaks about the Global Chess League, the Candidates, India’s young prodigies and the origin of his fascination with tennis.

title: Twenty20 vision: SKY the limit after India’s Gill course correction

title: Aadhaar-PAN linking: December 31 deadline, penalty of Rs 1,000; things to know
description: Urgent action is required for all PAN cardholders. The Income Tax Department has set December 31, 2025, as the final deadline to link your PAN with Aadhaar. Failure to comply will render your PAN card inoperative, leading to significant financial penalties and tax implications.  A Rs 1,000 late fee applies for those linking after the initial period.

title: Bangladesh unrest: Please save us, open borders - Hindus send SOS from Dhaka
description: Hindus in Bangladesh are pleading with India to open its borders, fearing escalating violence and persecution following recent lynchings.  Concerns are heightened by the potential return of a hardline BNP leader, with minorities feeling trapped and vulnerable.  Activists criticize Indian Hindu organizations for inaction, warning of a potential 'holocaust' if borders remain closed.

title: Travis Kelce reveals Taylor Swift habit that quietly improved his health
description: Travis Kelce shared how his relationship with Taylor Swift has transformed his routines, particularly through their shared love of cooking. Swift's sourdough baking and healthier eating habits have significantly improved Kelce's gut health and overall well-being, showcasing a grounded side of the athlete as they build a life together through simple, shared rituals.

title: Jordan Spieth net worth 2025: How the golf star built his fortune
description: Jordan Spieth, a celebrated American golfer, boasts a remarkable career. He has secured three major championships and the FedEx Cup. Off the course, he supports charitable causes through his foundation.

description: Former Chelsea star Frank Lampard, a decorated player and manager, has achieved significant success in football. Despite their public profiles, the couple prioritizes their children, maintaining a combined net worth estimated at £100 million through their respective careers and investments.
